scope: Develop a terminal-based notepad application using the textual library. The application should feature a TUI with: a sidebar listing all notes, a main editor pane for syntax-free text editing, keyboard shortcuts (Ctrl+N new, Ctrl+S save, Ctrl+D delete), notes persisted to a JSON file with title/body/timestamps, a dark theme, and responsiveness to terminal resizing.

tasks.title: Implement NoteManager with basic CRUD operations
tasks.description: Implement NoteManager class with methods: add_note, update_note, delete_note, get_all_notes. Ensure notes are persisted to a JSON file with title/body/timestamps.

tasks.title: Implement MainApp layout and basic functionality
tasks.description: Implement MainApp class with a sidebar (ListView) and a main editor pane (TextArea). Ensure the UI is responsive to terminal resizing and uses a dark theme.

tasks.title: Implement note selection and display in MainApp
tasks.description: Handle selection changes in the sidebar to update the editor content. Implement NoteSelected message and on_note_selected event handler.

tasks.title: Tests for NoteManager and MainApp
tasks.description: Write tests for NoteManager: add_note, update_note, delete_note, get_all_notes. Write tests for MainApp: on_mount, on_list_view_selected, on_note_selected, action_new_note, action_save_note, action_delete_note.

task_summaries: ✗ task_1: Implement NoteManager with basic CRUD operations (2 iter)
✗ task_2: Implement MainApp layout and basic functionality (2 iter)
✗ task_3: Implement note selection and display in MainApp (3 iter)
